snippet: The United Nations expressed alarm about the fate of North Koreans feared to have been deported from Vietnam via China back to their homeland.
abstract: United Nations fears nine North Koreans arrested in Vietnam may have been deported via China to their home country, where they could face torture or execution; urges Vietnamese and Chinese authorities to clarify fate of North Koreans.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations expressed alarm about the fate of North Koreans feared to have been deported from Vietnam via China back to their homeland.

headline.print_headline: United Nations; 9 North Koreans Feared Deported

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
